Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, Allosaur, AllosaurCorpse, AllosaurEgg, Brachiosaur, BrachiosaurCorpse, BrachiosaurEgg, Bug, Bush, Capabilities, carnivoreMealKit, Corpse, Crater, Dinosaur, Dirt, Egg, Floor, Floor, Floor, FoodSource, Fruit, Ground, Item, Laser, LockedDoor, MartianItem, Player, Player, Player, PortableItem, Stegosaur, StegosaurCorpse, StegosaurEgg, Stick, Tree, Tree, vegetarianMealKit, VendingMachine, Wall, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
